s0421.chinese: 魏筑長城，自鄭濱洛以北，有上郡。
s0421.literal: Wei built the Great Wall, from Zheng north along the Luo, had Shang commandery.
s0421.idiomatic: Wei built the Great Wall, from Zheng north along the Luo, had Shang commandery.

s0422.literal: Chu from Hanzhong south had Ba and Qianzhong.
s0422.idiomatic: Chu from Hanzhong south had Ba and Qianzhong.

s0423.chinese: 周室微，諸侯力政，爭相併。
s0423.literal: The Zhou house was weak, the lords governed by force, contended to annex each other.
s0423.idiomatic: The Zhou house was weak, the lords governed by force, contended to annex each other.

s0424.chinese: 秦僻在雍州，不與中國諸侯之會盟，夷翟遇之。
s0424.literal: Qin was remote in Yong province, did not participate in the alliances of the central states lords, treated as Rong and Di.
s0424.idiomatic: Qin was remote in Yong province, did not participate in the alliances of the central states lords, treated as Rong and Di.

s0425.chinese: 孝公於是布惠，振孤寡，招戰士，明功賞。
s0425.literal: Duke Xiao then spread benevolence, aided orphans and widows, recruited warriors, clarified merit rewards.
s0425.idiomatic: Duke Xiao then spread benevolence, aided orphans and widows, recruited warriors, clarified merit rewards.

s0426.chinese: 下令國中曰：「昔我繆公自岐雍之閒，修德行武，東平晉亂，以河為界，西霸戎翟，廣地千里，天子致伯，諸侯畢賀，為後世開業，甚光美。
s0426.literal: Issued command in the state: 'In ancient times, our Duke Mu from between Qi and Yong, cultivated virtue and practiced military affairs, pacified Jin's disorders to the east with the Yellow River as boundary, became hegemon of the western Rong and Di, expanded territory a thousand li, the Son of Heaven granted hegemony, all lords congratulated, opened enterprises for later generations, extremely glorious and beautiful.
s0426.idiomatic: Issued command in the state: 'In ancient times, our Duke Mu from between Qi and Yong, cultivated virtue and practiced military affairs, pacified Jin's disorders to the east with the Yellow River as boundary, became hegemon of the western Rong and Di, expanded territory a thousand li, the Son of Heaven granted hegemony, all lords congratulated, opened enterprises for later generations, extremely glorious and beautiful.

s0427.chinese: 會往者厲、躁、簡公、出子之不寧，國家內憂，未遑外事，三晉攻奪我先君河西地，諸侯卑秦、醜莫大焉。
s0427.literal: Encountering in the past the unrest of Li, Zhao, Jian, and Chu Zi, the state had internal worries, no leisure for external affairs, the three Jin attacked and seized our former lord's Hexi lands, the lords belittled Qin, no shame greater than this.
s0427.idiomatic: Encountering in the past the unrest of Li, Zhao, Jian, and Chu Zi, the state had internal worries, no leisure for external affairs, the three Jin attacked and seized our former lord's Hexi lands, the lords belittled Qin, no shame greater than this.

s0428.chinese: 獻公即位，鎮撫邊境，徙治櫟陽，且欲東伐，復繆公之故地，修繆公之政令。
s0428.literal: Duke Xian ascended, pacified the borders, moved the capital to Queyang, and wished to attack east, recover Duke Mu's former lands, follow Duke Mu's policies.
s0428.idiomatic: Duke Xian ascended, pacified the borders, moved the capital to Queyang, and wished to attack east, recover Duke Mu's former lands, follow Duke Mu's policies.

s0429.chinese: 寡人思念先君之意，常痛於心。
s0429.literal: I think of our former lord's intentions, constantly pained in my heart.
s0429.idiomatic: I think of our former lord's intentions, constantly pained in my heart.

s0430.chinese: 賓客群臣有能出奇計彊秦者，吾且尊官，與之分土。」
s0430.literal: Guests and ministers who can put forth extraordinary plans to strengthen Qin, I will honor with office and divide land with them.'
s0430.idiomatic: Guests and ministers who can put forth extraordinary plans to strengthen Qin, I will honor with office and divide land with them.'

s0431.chinese: 於是乃出兵東圍陜城，西斬戎之獂王。
s0431.literal: Therefore sent troops east to besiege Xia city, west beheaded the Rong's Mi Wang.
s0431.idiomatic: Therefore sent troops east to besiege Xia city, west beheaded the Rong's Mi Wang.

s0432.chinese: 衛鞅聞是令下，西入秦，因景監求見孝公。
s0432.literal: Wei Yang heard this command was issued, entered Qin from the west, through Jing Jian sought to see Duke Xiao.
s0432.idiomatic: Wei Yang heard this command was issued, entered Qin from the west, through Jing Jian sought to see Duke Xiao.

s0433.literal: Second year, the Son of Heaven sent sacrificial meat.
s0433.idiomatic: Second year, the Son of Heaven sent sacrificial meat.

s0434.chinese: 三年，衛鞅說孝公變法修刑，內務耕稼，外勸戰死之賞罰，孝公善之。
s0434.literal: Third year, Wei Yang persuaded Duke Xiao to change laws and reform punishments, internally focus on farming, externally encourage rewards and punishments for battle deaths, Duke Xiao approved it.
s0434.idiomatic: Third year, Wei Yang persuaded Duke Xiao to change laws and reform punishments, internally focus on farming, externally encourage rewards and punishments for battle deaths, Duke Xiao approved it.

s0435.chinese: 甘龍、杜摯等弗然，相與爭之。
s0435.literal: Gan Long, Du Zhi and others disagreed, disputed with each other about it.
s0435.idiomatic: Gan Long, Du Zhi and others disagreed, disputed with each other about it.

s0436.literal: In the end used Yang's laws, the common people suffered from them;
s0436.idiomatic: In the end used Yang's laws, the common people suffered from them;

s0437.literal: After three years, the common people became accustomed to them.
s0437.idiomatic: After three years, the common people became accustomed to them.

s0438.literal: Then appointed Yang as Left Senior Grand Master.
s0438.idiomatic: Then appointed Yang as Left Senior Grand Master.

s0439.literal: His affairs are in the Shang Jun chapter.
s0439.idiomatic: His affairs are in the Shang Jun chapter.
